> <OLD>
>
> WHEELIE's files upon MAGMATRON were very limited, almost entirely to gossip.
>  Along with MAGMATRON and the legendary Predacon General GALVATRON, few
> other could have ever given as many skipped beats to Maximal Fuel Pumps.
> Both had been, according to what little information WHEELIE had ever heard,
> listing as missing, dead, or exterminated.  But if MAGMATRON had shown
> himself here, then what of the otehr?
>
> OOC - Not sure if the Beast Wars II character GALVATRON has shown up here,
> but it seemed appropriate to reference him in the same thought bubble as
> MAGMATRON.  Otherwise, either way it can be WHEELIE just being vastly
> unfamiliar with both and going by gossip, and not having personal experience
> with eitehr - they could have both been dead millenia for all he knew. ;)

OOC: Nope he hasn't, but there is a chance that he will soon enough.
The Galvatron that is part of Hydras is the G1 Galvatron, although he
had a very similar dragon alt mode.

> <OLD - WHEELIE>
>
> At this point, there was a confused..  Blink from WHEELIE.  Speaking
> quietly, "What is this, what have we here?  How have you come to be without
> cheer?"
>
> Glancing over RODIMUS, his old friend seemingly aged for the damage he had
> taken like KUP to WHEELIE's sensors, body seeming partially faded, even
> though the glow was still omnipresent.
>
> "What has happened here, and what is going on?  You looked like you were at
> the bottom fo the foot, stomped on by Trypticon."
>
> Pausing and then continuing, "Now, I am gald you are here, but a few things
> we have to know..  Something very wrong is in this area, and out of it we
> will have to go.  We cannot speak, we cannot sense, we cannot call afar.  It
> is as if we are cut off from existence here, like webbed up in a separate
> jar."

<NEW>

There was a nod from RODIMUS as he struggled to sit up, causing one of
the Cornu, presumably a nurse to step in.  "Now you know that you
shouldn't be trying to get up yet.." She said in warm and yet chiding
tones.

RODIMUS looked at her, "Yes I know, but I must." He said as he
continued to sit up in bed." I have been here too long as it is,
people need me."

The nurse stepped back, loking something like a mother hen, obviously
trying to hold him back, but not sure if she should.

"I don't know exactly what's going on yet." RODIMUS said in a voice
that was getting stronger by the moment. "All I know is that Cyclonus
and I where following the trail that the dinosaur's left and then
three seekers attacked us."

RODIMUS paused grunting as he pulled his legs over the side of the
bed. "We lost communications in there somewhere, we couldn't call for
help. I think I downed one and Cyclonus was dealing with the other
two." He paused for a moment as if trying to remember, "I can't
remember what happened after that."

Finally RODIMUS looked up at UNUS, as if just his presence, "Who are
you?" He focused on ASTRA and then on FIREHORN, "You two I think I
remember." He scratched his head. "But not much . . . it's a jumble."

"Yes, that was me." FRIEHORN said gruffly. ASTRA just smiled coyly.

UNUS smiled, "Rest my friend." He said, his smile warm and friendly.
"I think we all need to talk."

The nurse was running a scanner over RODIMUS, the look on her face was
not a happy one. "You are not fully healed yet, you need more time to
rest."

(TAG)

Preston
